sentence: Unilever PLC ( UL ) will begin trading ex-dividend on August 03, 2016.
A cash dividend payment of $0.3531 per share is scheduled to be paid on September 07, 2016.
Shareholders who purchased UL prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment.
This represents an -3.21% decrease from the prior dividend payment.
At the current stock price of $46.49, the dividend yield is 3.04%.
The previous trading day's last sale of UL was $46.49, representing a -3.73% decrease from the 52 week high of $48.29 and a 20.44% increase over the 52 week low of $38.60.
UL is a part of the Basic Industries sector, which includes companies such as Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ) and Unilever NV ( UN ).
Zacks Investment Research reports UL's forecasted earnings growth in 2016 as 6.44%, compared to an industry average of 3.6%.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the UL Dividend History page.
Our Dividend Calendar has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.

It also has the highest percent weighting of UL at 11.65%.
